abstract: Pro-Western Moldovans are dismayed by Washington's growing ties with tycoon Vlad Plahotniuc, who has toxic political reputation at home; alliance raises questions over whether United States should turn to people like Plahotniuc, who is pro-Western but stands accused of strong-arm tactics and corruption, for support against Russia.
lead_paragraph: Vlad Plahotniuc is so toxic even his political friends usually try to keep their distance in public, but a State Department official met with him.

headline.main: Moldova Is Rattled as Washington Welcomes a Feared Tycoon
headline.print_headline: Moldova Is Rattled, but Moscow’s Allies Cheer, as Washington Welcomes a Tycoon

snippet: Vlad Plahotniuc is so toxic even his political friends usually try to keep their distance in public, but a State Department official met with him.
